event.title: HRMS Software in Dubai | Payroll Software in UAE | Top HR software in UAE
event.description:
Zeta software is an ISO Certified leading supplier of world class business software. Since its inception in 1997, we have earned for ourselves the trust and goodwill of over 2000 customers with deployment in 20 countries with over 10,000 core users and over 2,00,000 ESS users. We have our Regional Offices in Europe (UK) Middle East (Dubai) Africa (Kenya) and Asia (India)

Zeta HRMS : Now let technology help you manage the key assets of your organization, people! HRMS software efficiently gets you through a full employee life cycle with core capabilities like recruitment and payroll extending to advanced functions like analytics.

Zeta Payroll : Accuracy and reliability are the key qualities every payroll system needs and Payroll software offers you the same. Effortlessly store, track and process employee compensations and deductions, all while mitigating errors improving compliance and saving your time.
